A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I saw the original Star Wars movie on its release weekend back in the 1970's and have seen every movie since.  This movie ranks in my top 3 of all the movies in the Star Wars universe.  It is the bridge to the next set of movies for this great franchise.  Old characters are gone or fade to lesser roles while new ones are introduced and step forward to greater roles.  Not sure why \"fans\" hate this or what they were expecting but IMHO it was one of the best in the franchise and well done to set the stage for what is to come.
